title: Stationery and Uniforms
summary: Padhaai supports the cause of education by providing financial help to children for purchase of stationery and uniforms.

title: Libraries
summary: Field studies have revealed that most schools in villages around Bangalore lack a library. We work to establish and support libraries in these schools.

title: Notebook Donation
summary: Padhaai's initial endeavor was to provide notebooks (used and new) to students who were unable to afford them.

title: Scholarships
summary: Padhaai's scholarships are targeted at families who are planning to take their children out of school due to financial constraints.
